name: places/ChIJVXiteqFZwokRa2C1_0QR8Ss
formattedAddress: 38 E 32nd St Floor 4, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 38 E 32nd St Floor 4, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Sirianni is an excellent acupuncturist with great expertise. He has helped me a lot with my lower back, upper back, neck and upper chest pain.
He is always very thorough, showing great attention to detail, taking the time to treat all areas of pain/discomfort, so I have never felt rushed. In addition, he offers advice for stretching exercises that have also helped with pain relief. Professional, very clean, relaxing and friendly environment with very helpful staff. Overall, a very positive experience, much needed when in pain, so highly recommended!

originalText.text: I couldn’t say better things about my experience seeing Bob for acupuncture. I started seeing him for pain relief after a running overuse injury. His expertise has helped me tremendously throughout my recovery and training. I was able to run my best time at the half marathon a year after an IT band injury. Bob is incredibly thorough in his assessment and treatment. He’s helped me overcome knee, hip, and lower leg pain in order to continue training and getting stronger. Bob’s bedside manner is excellent. He’s an excellent listener and his care is tailored to my specific needs. I constantly find myself recommending him to my colleagues. I am very thankful I started seeing him.

originalText.text:
Exceptional Acupuncture Doctor
Life-Changing Experience
Dr. Sirianni took the time to understand my specific health concerns and goals. The acupuncture sessions were incredibly relaxing. Dr. Sirianni explained each step of the process, making sure I was comfortable throughout. I was amazed at how quickly I felt the positive effects of the treatment. In addition to acupuncture, he provided a variety of recommendations that complemented the treatment, contributing to my overall well-being. I highly recommend Dr. Sirianni to anyone seeking acupuncture and holistic healthcare.

originalText.text:
Horrible experience, dealing with his team. I called because I was experiencing chronic pain. They were totally unhelpful offering me an appointment nearly 4 months in the future. Completely clueless and unhelpful receptionist. I asked if I could be put on a cancellation list and the receptionist didn’t even seem to understand that basic request. I’ve heard that he is an excellent acupuncturist, but what’s the point if you can’t get an appointment for months? It seems that, no matter how much you pay for healthcare in this country, it’s impossible to get good treatment. I do not recommend reaching out to this doctor.

In the end, I just went to a local acupuncturist in my neighborhood, who was excellent, and not very expensive.
